data.actual_result: There are no buttons, just a blank grey window bar.
data.expected_result: You should see some buttons (greyed out or with a function for leaving fullscreen and closing).
data.short_description: [Mac only] No buttons for window bar when watching a fullscreen video
data.steps_to_repro: - Open any movie (e.g. YouTube) in fullscreen - Hover your mouse cursor near the very top of the Mac screen - Observe the buttons for the windows bar there
